body: Now, I'm not sure if this is a good idea or not, but we'll see how it fairs. When Avicus release a new update ( hopefully soon ) I'm hoping that they add a new Donator Rank. I think this should be called Platinum - you donate $200 dollars in one go or monthly payments of $30. I just think that maybe people are getting bored of being Diamond sometimes. This is a lot of money I know, but the Platinum Rank can be multi-coloured on your name. Opinions on this?
